Name: 一个极好的剪贴板
About the game: 1.Copy content text, image, file path 2. Content search You can search for copied text/file paths by normal search and regular matching 3. Collection Favorite/unfavorite selected copy 4.Hotkey paste Shortcut key to call out the current interface and paste the selected content into the previous editing window 5.Batch paste Batch paste selected content to the previous editing window 6.Cloud synchronization win / mac copy, favorite, delete content cloud synchronization 7.Switch display Toggle Show All\Text\Pictures\File(Path)\Favorites 8.Picture preview Automatically preview when the mouse is placed on the picture 9.Night mode Full interface night mode 10. Storage content Up to 500 historical records can be stored 11.Other settings 1. On the main page, tap the switch button in the upper right corner to quickly pause/start clipboard recording 2. On the main page, tap the moon/sun button in the upper right corner to quickly switch between night/day mode 3. You can set shortcut keys to quickly paste content 4. The type of record clipboard content can be set (text, picture, file [path]) 5. You can set whether to paste automatically after selection 6. Can set whether to paste across screens (copy on one machine, paste quickly on another machine [both machines need to log in]) 7. It can be set to add a newline, and the program can automatically add a newline when pasting the content to the corresponding window 8. The picture preview can be set, and there is a floating preview window to enlarge the picture when the mouse slides over the picture option 9. Folding display can be set. In this mode, the picture is displayed as a thumbnail, and the text is displayed in a single line 10. Automatic folding can be set, when the form is zoomed to a certain size, it will be automatically folded and displayed, and restored when stretched 11. The number of loops can be set. Setting this option can set the number of content to be switched when the shortcut key is pasted.
